Name: Do You See the Waving Cape
About the game: On my 7th birthday, my grandma knitted a cape for me, which started my dream of being a hero. After that, I started a “Great” adventure… life is frustrating, and the gap between imagination and reality is always huge, but love became the cape that waves behind me forever. The inspiration for this game comes from this experience. This game “chats” with you in a very special narrative style, like a new friend. In the form of a game, we together go back to the time of our childhood, looking for precious memories. The game integrates different gameplay into the storylines. you will experience lonely flying, fierce battle, nervous parkour, as well as various kinds of puzzles…This will be a very special experience about love, dream, courage, as well as some silly memories. Special narrative style Fun and Healing stories Unique hand-drawn art style graphic More than 10 original background music 11 chapters and 50 levels with different types of gameplay all in one game
